name: Solgaleo GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Ultra Road
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sunsteel Strike
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sol Burst GX
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 5 Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
